description:
First Time in The Blockchain Solution For The Global Beauty Industry
Introducing NINSA B TOKEN, a next generation Crypto Hedge Fund dedicated to strategic investments within the blockchain sector.

The world’s only enterprise blockchain solution for global payments
Our Blockchain is Better Than Any Other Blockchain
Our service is built on Ethereum Blockchain : NINSA B token is an ERC20 token. NINSA B tokens will be at the heart of the use of our intelligent assistant service : subscription, content proposal, rewards, and more.

NINSA B TOKEN is developing a number of blockchain-based tools, as well as introducing two innovative Beauty Items Industry concepts, technologically advanced and highly efficient, developed as future business models for the global Beauty industry.
Among the tools of NINSA B TOKEN are a Trusted Review Platform (already up-and-running),
All tools have blockchain integrated functionalities and are served by a custom ERC20 token, also named NINSA B TOKEN.
name: Ninsa B Token
